alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 6:23PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Discrete thunderstorm cells will impact portions of southern Marin, northwestern Alameda, Contra Costa, southeastern Sonoma and east central San Francisco Counties through 730 PM PST... At 622 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Geronimo, or 7 miles west of San Rafael, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Antioch, San Leandro, Alameda, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, San Rafael, Novato, Dublin, Danville, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette and El Cerrito. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
